In concerts held twice a year, the group hosts more than a hundred listeners each time. In addition to concerts, the community aims to organize seminars, interviews and events on all subjects related to Turkish Music and has hosted many Turkish Music artists to date. The community also cooperates with many other student societies and clubs within Bilkent and organizes mini concerts in this context. The community, which has a friendly and fun atmosphere, invites every Bilkent resident who is devoted to Turkish music to become a member of the community.
Uluslararası Hukuk Çalışmaları Topluluğu: International Law Studies Community (Bilkent Law Community) is a student community that appeals mostly to students of the Faculty of Law, but also to all other students interested in the world of business and law. In addition to its big events held on certain dates every year, it has managed to reach not only Bilkent University students but also different university students from different cities of Türkiye in the online period with its bi-weekly conferences on certain topics. The topics of the events are both current news and the international business sector. The main events include Career Tailoring, which focuses on law offices in Istanbul and the functioning of the legal sector, Iuris Agora, which deals with the place of law in the business world and other sectors, We in Business, which organizes weekly conferences on current issues, and the Magic team, which provides information about the legal sector abroad.
Uluslararası İlişkiler Topluluğu: Bilkent International Relations Society was established to raise awareness about political science and international relations-themed issues to university students and other interested Bilkent residents. The goal of the community is to combine the theory and practice of the discipline of international relations by organizing events that inform Bilkent residents about the events in world politics. Since its establishment, our community has brought together many academics and diplomats with students and ensures the development of students' visions about the international agenda. Our community organizes events that increase the interaction and exchange of ideas between students and provide participants with the opportunity to analyze the information obtained by professionals.
Uluslararası Öğrenciler Kulübü: International Students Club (Bilkent International House) is a student club that aims to bring together students from all nationalities. The club organizes orientation events for first-year students every semester, trips in and out of Ankara, international events, seminars with guest speakers and more. Some past events include awareness campaigns for various social issues, Ambassador Talks, the first (and now annual) International Festival at Bilkent University, trips to multiple cities, football tournaments, and various movie nights. Follow our social media addresses to be informed about our future events!
Uzay ve Havacılık Topluluğu: We plan to create opportunities for the application of theoretical knowledge in practical environments by creating teams to work on a series of projects, from basic prototypes to advanced systems designed for real-world applications, and to participate in competitions such as SUAS, Teknofest and METU VTOL. Additionally, we aim to participate in competitions and events involving space technologies, including model satellite projects, and to help our members connect with the aerospace industry through seminars, training and field trips given by experts from companies operating in the aerospace field.
Vegan Topluluğu: Bilkent Vegan Community aims to bring together and provide solidarity with everyone who is vegan, wants to be vegan, or is curious about veganism, especially Bilkent students. Safe area policies apply to all events and networks.
Veri Bilimi ve Analitiği Topluluğu: Bilkent Data Science and Analytics Community is a dynamic student club that aims to bring together students from various academic disciplines such as machine learning, statistics, economics and business analytics. Its primary focus is to enable students to collaborate on meaningful projects by encouraging participation in data science-focused activities. The community helps its members develop a deep understanding of data science and how this discipline can be applied to complex, real-world problems. It aims to improve the knowledge and skills of its members in areas such as data analysis, programming and data-driven decision-making, and organizes various training events such as training sessions, applied workshops and collaborative projects for this purpose. Besides technical development, the Community places emphasis on building strong ties, especially among its members with similar interests. It achieves this through a variety of social and group activities that encourage cooperation and friendship. By hosting datathons, data analysis competitions, and other collaborative events, the club encourages members to use their knowledge and creativity to develop data-driven solutions to real-world problems. Bilkent Data Science and Analytics Community also connects its members with academic experts and industry professionals, providing valuable opportunities for them to meet and learn from leaders in the field. This makes significant contributions to the academic and professional development of its members. Ultimately, the main goal of the Community is to create a fun, inclusive and collaborative environment where students can improve their data science skills, socialize, make lasting connections and improve themselves in interdisciplinary studies.
